sentences.en: Blood enters the kidneys via the renal artery.
sentences.cn: 血液通过肾动脉流进肾脏。

sentences.en: Did you get the labs back on that renal colic?
sentences.cn: 你去拿那个肾绞痛病人的化验报告了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Flank pain associated with burning on urination, suggests renal calculi.
sentences.cn: 侧腹痛伴有排尿灼表明是肾结石.

sentences.en: For renal disease, an etiologic relationship has not been established conclusively.
sentences.cn: 对于肾脏疾病, 却仍不能做出病因关系的结论.

sentences.en: He collapsed from acute renal failure.
sentences.cn: 他的身体因为严重的肾衰竭而垮掉了。

sentences.en: However, a pre - existing renal abnormality will increase the risk of rupture.
sentences.cn: 然而, 若存在肾脏的先天性异常则会增加此种破裂的风险.

sentences.en: Increased renal excretion occurs with both respiratory and metabolic alkalosis.
sentences.cn: 在呼吸性碱中毒和代谢性碱中毒中钾离子的肾排泄增加.

sentences.en: It is this combination that results in post - traumatic renal insufficiency.
sentences.cn: 在创伤后,这些因素的综合作用即可导致肾功能不足.

sentences.en: Measurement of the hourly urine volume is not by itself a reliable test of renal function.
sentences.cn: 测每个小时尿量,并不是一种可靠的肾功能检验.

sentences.en: Objective: To evaluate the effect of laparoscopy in treating renal cyst.
sentences.cn: 摘要目的: 评价腹腔镜下治疗肾囊肿的疗效.

sentences.en: People with renal diseases have to eat salt - free foods.
sentences.cn: 患有肾脏疾病的人只能吃不含盐的食物.

sentences.en: Renal glomeruli had hyaline changes suggestive of an immunologic process.
sentences.cn: 肾小球有表明免疫学过程的玻璃样变化.

sentences.en: Single dose injection method is used for substances with slow renal excretion rate.
sentences.cn: 单个剂量注射法,这可用于肾排泄率缓慢的试验物质.

sentences.en: The renal lision of crotalid envenomation is a glomerulonephritis.
sentences.cn: 响尾蛇科蛇毒中毒的肾脏损害为肾小球肾炎.

sentences.en: The single pyramid projects well into the renal pelvis.
sentences.cn: 单个锥体明显凸入肾盂.

sentences.en: They must be monitored in the long term to ensure that their renal function will not be impaired.
sentences.cn: 必须对这些小孩进行长期监控才能确定他们的肾脏功能是否受到损伤。

phrases.tran_cn: 慢性肾功能衰竭；慢性肾衰竭
肾细胞癌；肾脏上皮肾细胞癌
